name: pnp-list-formatting-board-tags
title: Board Tags
shortDescription: This sample displays a formatted card in a board view that enables tagging, updating card dates, menu options to reorder cards within their category, sharing links, flaging (focus colors), assigning a user, and minimizing/expaning the card.
longDescription: This sample displays a formatted card in a board view that enables tagging, updating card dates, menu options to reorder cards within their category, sharing links, flaging (focus colors), assigning a user, and minimizing/expaning the card.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
